'''1.0.1''' is a server update for ''Minecraft'' ({{el|je}}) released on November 24, 2011,<ref>{{tweet|jeb|139688276922613761|The minecraft_server.jar has been updated to 1.0.1, fixing the login key problem and a null pointer exception|24 Nov 2011}}</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes in [[Java Edition 1.0.0|1.0.0]] servers.

1.0.1 is the final server-only version of ''Java Edition'' and the final version released in 2011. As a server-only update, 1.0.0 remained the current client version.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* <code>Invalid server key</code> error fixed when attempting to log into servers.
* <code>Null pointer exception</code> error fixed when logging into servers.
